message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Can you consider that?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $13000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12750. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $12900. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to go low, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12600. Can you consider that?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $12800. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
I appreciate your persistence, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
